title: Backpack
desc:
*Seriously, where do you fit all of that?*

Provides 5 defense, and if you defeat any enemy while wearing this, and your final HP was lower than your initial HP in the fight, you will be awarded with a random bonus item with a Sell Value of 1.

Most of the possible items are materials that would normally only be provided by early-game monsters, and would otherwise become unobtainable after you've delved deeper into the Dungeon. While the nigh-lack of Defense will ensure that typical battles will hurt more than usual, many of these items have good late-game uses, either as-is or as crafting ingredients.
